QuestData.Title: Proof of Treachery
QuestData.Description: Although Onyxia has been exposed and removed from the court, the Defias who carried out her plan must be punished. Carry word to Grand Admiral Jes-Tereth in Stormwind castle that the Defias are the ones who carried out the Varian's kidnapping. I have little doubt that Stormwind's armies will mete out swift and terrible justice to those involved.$B$BI can use my magic to expedite your trip to Stormwind. Just speak to me when you're prepared to go, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Jaina to travel to Stormwind and meet with Grand Admiral Jes-Tereth.
QuestData.RewardText: So it was the Defias who served as the hands of Onyxia in this plot?$B$B<The king's face grows red with anger and his hands clench into fists.>$B$BYou and Lady Jaina have done Stormwind a great service this day. The traitors will not live long enough to regret their crimes.
